quiz.question: ____ ____ ___ testament
quiz.explanation: 遗嘱; 证明, 最后遗嘱. He left his last will and testament with his lawyer. 他把最后遗嘱留给了律师。

quiz.question: ______________ amendment
quiz.explanation: 修正案; 修改, 宪法修正案. The constitutional amendment was ratified by all states. 宪法修正案被所有州批准。

quiz.question: _________ bombardment
quiz.explanation: 炮击; 轰炸, 炮兵轰炸. The city endured heavy artillery bombardment. 这座城市遭受了猛烈的炮兵轰炸。

quiz.question: cement ____
quiz.explanation: 水泥; 巩固, 水泥墙. Workers built a strong cement wall around the property. 工人们在房产周围建了一堵坚固的水泥墙。

quiz.question: _______ commencement
quiz.explanation: 开始; 毕业典礼, 大学毕业典礼. She graduated at the college commencement ceremony. 她在大学毕业典礼上毕业。

quiz.question: ______ derangement
quiz.explanation: 错乱; 精神失常, 精神错乱. The doctor diagnosed mental derangement in the patient. 医生诊断患者有精神错乱。

quiz.question: _____ rapprochement
quiz.explanation: 和解; 友好关系的恢复, 和平和解. The nations worked toward peace rapprochement. 各国努力实现和平和解。

quiz.question: clement _______
quiz.explanation: 温和的; 仁慈的, 温和的天气. The clement weather made outdoor activities pleasant. 温和的天气使户外活动愉快。

quiz.question: inclement _______
quiz.explanation: 恶劣的; 严酷的, 恶劣的天气. The inclement weather forced cancellation of the event. 恶劣的天气迫使活动取消。

quiz.question: ______ befuddlement
quiz.explanation: 困惑; 迷惑, 精神困惑. His mental befuddlement made decision-making difficult. 他的精神困惑使决策变得困难。

quiz.question: _____ supplement
quiz.explanation: 补充; 增补, 每日补充剂. She takes a daily supplement of vitamins. 她每天服用维生素补充剂。

quiz.question: ______ embezzlement
quiz.explanation: 挪用; 盗用, 犯挪用罪. The accountant was arrested for commit embezzlement. 会计因犯挪用罪被捕。

quiz.question: ______ increment
quiz.explanation: 增量; 增加, 年度增量. Employees receive an annual increment based on performance. 员工根据表现获得年度增量。

quiz.question: ______ procurement
quiz.explanation: 采购; 获得, 公共采购. The government follows strict public procurement rules. 政府遵循严格的公共采购规则。

quiz.question: self-abasement ______
quiz.explanation: 自我贬低, 自我贬低仪式. The cult practiced a self-abasement ritual. 该教派实行自我贬低仪式。

quiz.question: ________ denouement
quiz.explanation: 结局; 收场, 戏剧性结局. The play features a dramatic denouement in the final act. 该剧在最后一幕有戏剧性结局。

quiz.question: _______ fragment
quiz.explanation: 碎片; 片段, 陶器碎片. Archaeologists found a pottery fragment at the site. 考古学家在遗址发现了陶器碎片。

quiz.question: ____ pigment
quiz.explanation: 色素; 颜料, 皮肤色素. Melanin is the skin pigment that determines color. 黑色素是决定肤色的皮肤色素。

quiz.question: augment ________
quiz.explanation: 增加; 扩大, 增加容量. The company plans to augment capacity by 50 percent. 公司计划将容量增加50%。

quiz.question: ______ retrenchment
quiz.explanation: 紧缩; 削减, 预算紧缩. The recession forced budget retrenchment across departments. 经济衰退迫使各部门预算紧缩。

quiz.question: _____ blandishment
quiz.explanation: 奉承; 甜言蜜语, 甜蜜的奉承. She resisted his sweet blandishment and flattery. 她抵制了他甜蜜的奉承和恭维。

quiz.question: ______ impediment
quiz.explanation: 障碍; 妨碍, 语言障碍. He overcame a childhood speech impediment. 他克服了儿童时期的语言障碍。

quiz.question: _____ sediment
quiz.explanation: 沉积物, 河流沉积物. River sediment accumulated at the delta over centuries. 河流沉积物在三角洲积累了几个世纪。

quiz.question: _____ condiment
quiz.explanation: 调味品, 辛辣调味品. The restaurant offers various spicy condiment options. 餐厅提供各种辛辣调味品选择。

quiz.question: embodiment __ _______
quiz.explanation: 体现; 化身, 勇气的化身. The soldier was the embodiment of courage. 这位士兵是勇气的化身。

quiz.question: ____ regiment
quiz.explanation: 团; 军团, 陆军团. The army regiment was deployed to the border. 陆军团被部署到边境。

quiz.question: ___ _ compliment
quiz.explanation: 赞美; 称赞, 给予赞美. He stopped to pay a compliment on her work. 他停下来对她的工作给予赞美。

quiz.question: ______ sentiment
quiz.explanation: 情感; 观点, 公众情绪. Public sentiment shifted against the policy. 公众情绪转而反对该政策。

quiz.question: ____ presentiment
quiz.explanation: 预感, 不祥的预感. She had a dark presentiment about the journey. 她对这次旅行有不祥的预感。

quiz.question: _____ embankment
quiz.explanation: 堤岸; 路堤, 河堤. The river embankment prevents flooding in the city. 河堤防止城市洪水。

quiz.question: _____ ailment
quiz.explanation: 疾病; 小病, 小病. He stayed home with a minor ailment. 他因小病待在家里。

quiz.question: _______ installment
quiz.explanation: 分期付款; 部分, 每月分期付款. She pays the loan in monthly installment. 她按月分期付款偿还贷款。

quiz.question: containment ______
quiz.explanation: 遏制; 控制, 遏制政策. The government adopted a containment policy. 政府采取了遏制政策。

quiz.question: _____ attainment
quiz.explanation: 获得; 达到, 技能获得. The course focuses on skill attainment. 该课程侧重于技能获得。

quiz.question: foment ______
quiz.explanation: 煽动; 挑起, 煽动动乱. Agitators tried to foment unrest among workers. 煽动者试图在工人中煽动动乱。

quiz.question: _____-______ moment
quiz.explanation: 片刻; 时刻, 瞬间. He made a split-second moment decision. 他做出了瞬间决定。

quiz.question: _____ garment
quiz.explanation: 衣服, 外衣. Hang your outer garment in the closet. 把你的外衣挂在衣橱里。

quiz.question: _____ engrossment
quiz.explanation: 全神贯注; 正式誊写, 法律正式誊写. The legal engrossment of the contract is complete. 合同的法律正式誊写已完成。

quiz.question: ____ resentment
quiz.explanation: 怨恨; 愤恨, 深深的怨恨. He harbored deep resentment toward his rival. 他对对手怀有深深的怨恨。

quiz.question: _______ ointment
quiz.explanation: 软膏; 药膏, 治疗软膏. Apply the healing ointment to the wound twice daily. 每天两次将治疗软膏涂在伤口上。

quiz.question: _____ compartment
quiz.explanation: 隔间; 车厢, 火车车厢. We found seats in the train compartment. 我们在火车车厢里找到了座位。

quiz.question: deportment _____
quiz.explanation: 举止; 行为, 礼仪课. The finishing school taught deportment class. 礼仪学校教授礼仪课。

quiz.question: ________ vestment
quiz.explanation: 祭服; 法衣, 神父祭服. The bishop wore ornate priestly vestment. 主教穿着华丽的神父祭服。

quiz.question: ______ emolument
quiz.explanation: 报酬; 薪酬, 薪酬报酬. The executive received substantial salary emolument. 高管获得了丰厚的薪酬报酬。

quiz.question: immanent _______
quiz.explanation: 内在的; 固有的, 内在的正义. They believed in immanent justice in the universe. 他们相信宇宙中内在的正义。

quiz.question: permanent ______
quiz.explanation: 永久的; 持久的, 永久记号笔. Use a permanent marker to label the boxes. 用永久记号笔给箱子贴标签。

quiz.question: impermanent ___
quiz.explanation: 暂时的; 非永久的, 非永久性艺术. Sand mandalas are beautiful impermanent art forms. 沙坛城是美丽的非永久性艺术形式。

quiz.question: eminent _______
quiz.explanation: 杰出的; 著名的, 杰出的学者. The eminent scholar published groundbreaking research. 杰出的学者发表了开创性的研究。

quiz.question: preeminent _______
quiz.explanation: 卓越的; 杰出的, 杰出的学者. She is the preeminent scholar in her field. 她是该领域卓越的学者。

quiz.question: imminent ______
quiz.explanation: 即将发生的; 迫近的, 迫在眉睫的危险. The residents faced imminent danger from the hurricane. 居民面临飓风带来的迫在眉睫的危险。

quiz.question: ___ _______ continent
quiz.explanation: 大陆; 洲, 非洲大陆. Wildlife is abundant on the African continent. 非洲大陆野生动物丰富。

quiz.question: pertinent ________
quiz.explanation: 相关的; 切题的, 相关的问题. She asked a pertinent question about the policy. 她问了一个关于该政策的相关问题。

quiz.question: abstinent _________
quiz.explanation: 节制的; 戒除的, 节制的生活方式. He maintained an abstinent lifestyle for health reasons. 出于健康原因,他保持节制的生活方式。

quiz.question: ____ exponent
quiz.explanation: 指数; 倡导者, 数学指数. Students learn about math exponent in algebra. 学生在代数中学习数学指数。

quiz.question: repent ___
quiz.explanation: 悔改; 后悔, 忏悔罪过. The penitent came to repent sin. 悔罪者来忏悔罪过。

quiz.question: _____ adherent
quiz.explanation: 拥护者; 信徒, 政党拥护者. He remained a loyal party adherent. 他仍然是忠诚的政党拥护者。

quiz.question: coherent ________
quiz.explanation: 连贯的; 一致的, 连贯的论点. She presented a coherent argument to the committee. 她向委员会提出了连贯的论点。

quiz.question: abhorrent _____
quiz.explanation: 可憎的; 令人厌恶的, 可憎的罪行. Murder is an abhorrent crime to civilized society. 谋杀对文明社会来说是可憎的罪行。

quiz.question: _ torrent __ _____
quiz.explanation: 洪流; 急流, 一连串辱骂. He faced a torrent of abuse from critics. 他面临来自批评者的一连串辱骂。

quiz.question: misrepresent _____
quiz.explanation: 歪曲; 误传, 歪曲事实. The article deliberately misrepresent facts. 这篇文章故意歪曲事实。

quiz.question: omnipresent ______
quiz.explanation: 无所不在的, 无所不在的危险. Terrorism poses an omnipresent danger in modern times. 恐怖主义在现代构成无所不在的危险。

quiz.question: ____ consent
quiz.explanation: 同意; 准许, 给予同意. Parents must give consent for the field trip. 家长必须对实地考察给予同意。

quiz.question: ____ assent
quiz.explanation: 同意; 赞成, 给予同意. The board will give assent to the proposal. 董事会将对该提案给予同意。

quiz.question: _____ dissent
quiz.explanation: 异议; 不同意, 表达异议. Several members will voice dissent from the decision. 几位成员将对该决定表达异议。

quiz.question: latent ______
quiz.explanation: 潜在的; 隐藏的, 潜在缺陷. The product had a latent defect not visible initially. 该产品有一个最初看不见的潜在缺陷。

quiz.question: incompetent __________
quiz.explanation: 无能的; 不称职的, 无能的管理. Incompetent management led to the company's failure. 无能的管理导致了公司的失败。

quiz.question: penitent __________
quiz.explanation: 悔过的; 忏悔的, 悔过的表情. The criminal wore a penitent expression in court. 罪犯在法庭上带着悔过的表情。

quiz.question: impenitent ______
quiz.explanation: 不悔悟的, 不悔悟的罪人. The impenitent sinner showed no remorse. 不悔悟的罪人没有表现出悔恨。

quiz.question: ____ intent
quiz.explanation: 意图; 目的, 善意. Despite good intent, the plan failed. 尽管有善意,计划还是失败了。

quiz.question: _ malcontent _______
quiz.explanation: 不满者, 不满派系. A malcontent faction plotted against the leader. 不满派系密谋反对领导者。

quiz.question: omnipotent _____
quiz.explanation: 全能的, 全能的神. Many religions worship an omnipotent deity. 许多宗教崇拜全能的神。

quiz.question: consistent _______
quiz.explanation: 一致的; 连续的, 一致的模式. The data shows a consistent pattern over time. 数据显示随时间推移的一致模式。

quiz.question: remittent _____
quiz.explanation: 间歇性的, 间歇性发热. The patient suffered from remittent fever. 患者遭受间歇性发热。

quiz.question: intermittent ____
quiz.explanation: 间歇的; 断断续续的, 间歇性降雨. Intermittent rain fell throughout the day. 整天都有间歇性降雨。

quiz.question: _______ unguent
quiz.explanation: 软膏; 油膏, 治疗软膏. The herbalist prepared a healing unguent. 草药师准备了治疗软膏。

quiz.question: frequent _____
quiz.explanation: 频繁的; 常见的, 常旅客. She earned points as a frequent flyer. 她作为常旅客赚取积分。

quiz.question: subsequent ______
quiz.explanation: 随后的; 后来的, 随后的事件. Subsequent events proved him right. 随后的事件证明他是对的。

quiz.question: ________ delinquent
quiz.explanation: 拖欠的; 违法者, 少年犯. The juvenile delinquent was sent to reform school. 少年犯被送到少年管教所。

quiz.question: magniloquent ______
quiz.explanation: 夸张的; 浮夸的, 夸张的演讲. His magniloquent speech impressed no one. 他夸张的演讲没有打动任何人。

quiz.question: congruent _________
quiz.explanation: 全等的; 一致的, 全等三角形. The geometry lesson covered congruent triangles. 几何课涵盖了全等三角形。

quiz.question: incongruent ________
quiz.explanation: 不一致的; 不协调的, 不全等三角形. The incongruent triangle cannot match the other. 不全等三角形无法与另一个匹配。

quiz.question: ___ constituent
quiz.explanation: 组成部分; 选民, 关键成分. Water is a key constituent of the mixture. 水是混合物的关键成分。

quiz.question: vent ___________
quiz.explanation: 通风口; 发泄, 发泄挫折感. He needed to vent frustration after the loss. 失利后他需要发泄挫折感。

quiz.question: ___ advent __
quiz.explanation: 到来; 出现, 到来. The advent of technology changed everything. 技术的到来改变了一切。

quiz.question: _______ solvent
quiz.explanation: 溶剂; 有偿付能力的, 有机溶剂. The chemist used an organic solvent in the experiment. 化学家在实验中使用了有机溶剂。

quiz.question: circumvent ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 规避; 绕过, 规避规则. They tried to circumvent the rules through loopholes. 他们试图通过漏洞规避规则。

quiz.question: _________ restraint
quiz.explanation: 克制; 约束, 情感克制. She showed remarkable emotional restraint. 她表现出非凡的情感克制。

quiz.question: _____ constraint
quiz.explanation: 约束; 限制, 严格的约束. The project faced tight constraint on time and budget. 该项目面临时间和预算的严格约束。

quiz.question: acquaint ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 使熟悉, 使熟悉规则. New employees must acquaint with rules and procedures. 新员工必须熟悉规则和程序。

quiz.question: ______ flint
quiz.explanation: 燧石, 击打燧石. Early humans struck flint to make sparks. 早期人类击打燧石制造火花。

quiz.question: skinflint ________
quiz.explanation: 吝啬鬼; 守财奴, 吝啬的房东. The skinflint landlord refused all repairs. 吝啬的房东拒绝所有维修。

quiz.question: _______ mint
quiz.explanation: 薄荷; 铸币厂, 新铸造的. The coins were freshly mint at the facility. 硬币在设施中新铸造。

quiz.question: appoint _ _________
quiz.explanation: 任命; 委派, 任命委员会. The board will appoint a committee to investigate. 董事会将任命委员会进行调查。

quiz.question: _______ imprint
quiz.explanation: 印记; 痕迹, 公司印记. The book bore the company imprint on its spine. 这本书的书脊上有公司印记。

quiz.question: sprint ______
quiz.explanation: 冲刺, 冲刺终点. The runner accelerated for a sprint finish. 跑步者加速进行冲刺终点。

quiz.question: ___ _ tint
quiz.explanation: 色调; 淡色, 添加色调. The artist will add a tint of blue to the painting. 艺术家将在画中添加蓝色色调。

quiz.question: stint __
quiz.explanation: 限制; 节省, 在...上节省. Don't stint on quality when building a home. 建造房屋时不要在质量上节省。

quiz.question: upfront ____
quiz.explanation: 预付的; 坦率的, 预付费用. The upfront cost was higher than expected. 预付费用高于预期。

quiz.question: __ wont __
quiz.explanation: 习惯于; 惯常的, 习惯于. He is wont to rise early every morning. 他习惯于每天早上早起。

quiz.question: flaunt ______
quiz.explanation: 炫耀; 夸示, 炫耀财富. She loves to flaunt wealth with expensive cars. 她喜欢用昂贵的汽车炫耀财富。
